title: Java Loops II
description: How to solve the Hackerrank challenge in java, Java Loops II. We use the integers **a**, **b**, and **n** to create the following series: **(a + 2<sup>0</sup> . b), (a + 2 <sup>0</sup> . b + 2<sup>1</sup> . b), ..., (a + 2<sup>0</sup> . b + 2<sup>1</ sup> . b + ... + 2<sup>n-1</sup> . b)**. You are given **q** queries in the form of **a**, **b**, and **n**. For each query, print the series corresponding to the given **a**, **b**, and **n** values as a single line of space-separated **n** integers.
author: Douglas Matos
